name: Troubled Viking Waters
description:
Authors: 

- @brenlli

- @peter876

- @zuuhr

- @alejandracc

This game was made in a 39h game jam. The theme was 'vikings' and the revealed restriction was 'boxing glove'. 

It's an only-local-multiplayer game where you play against your friend and have to push them over the edge.

Controls:

Player 1 (Giraffe): WASD to move, and 'Q' and 'E' to punch

Player 2 (Racoon): IJKL to move, and 'U' and 'O' to punch

We hope you have fun playing it!
